creator: mmorris@mindspring.com
text:
Presenting a JSP page as XML can render jsp expressions in the wrong place. Sample Page

Your header says lang

 When displayed, this prints "en-usYour header says " instead of "Your header says en-us". If the "" element is replaced by an equivalent "<%@ taglib ...%>" element (and the "" element removed), then the page renders correctly.

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
Please attach a .war that includes struts-bean.tld and other class files.  I
need them to reproduce the bug.  Thanks.
I think this is the same bug as #4085 which should be fixed since 20011030.
creator: Andreas.Junghans@fh-karlsruhe.de

text:
I agree ... it certainly has the same effect.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4085 ***
creator: mmorris@mindspring.com
